    • getCardsSelected

    • getCardToPlayer

      public God getCardToPlayer​(int cardNumber)
      when a player choose a God (by sending a number), this method set that God's availiability to 'false' and return the God instance
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - the number of the God chosen
      Returns:
      chosen God's instance

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable​(int cardNumber)
      in the God selection phase of the game, tells if the card chosen is still availiable
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - the number of the card the player has chosen
      Returns:
      'true' if it's still availiable, 'false' if it has already been chosen by another player

    • extractCasualNumbers

      private int[] extractCasualNumbers​(int numberOfNumbers)
      it casually extract 2 or 3 numbers (based on the numberOfPlayers chosen by the first player) from 0 to numberOfGods
      Parameters:
      numberOfNumbers - chosen by the first Player, it tells if the game is gonna be between 2 or 3 people
      Returns:
      an array with the extracted numbers
